text: 3:3 Mat 24:43,44; Luk 12:39,40; Phong 16:15Maram aduna nangonda tambikhiba amadi nahakna takhrabasing adu ningsing-u, amasung madu illu aduga nahakki papsing adudagi pukning hong-u. Karigumba nahakna hougatrabadi, eina nangonda huranbagum lakkani amasung karamba matammda eina lakkadage haiba adu nahakna khangloi.
